EmailTemplate.name: Mar16 Minneapolis User Group Auto-Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for our Minneapolis User Group Event.
So you don’t forget, you can add the event to your calendar using this link: http://www.intapp.com/images/landingpages/calendar-events/Intapp_Open_User_Group_Minneapolis.ics
Best regards,
Jason Yu Marketing Programs Specialist Intapp – The Future of Client Success
